Hi,

I asked this question awhile ago (4 years, wow!). Find Ken's response =
here:

  http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/neat/message/3129?var=3D0

Bein=
g a game programmer, my natural tendency is toward computational efficiency=
. I believe Ken also said, perhaps later in that same thread, that his styl=
e of activation more closely resembled biological networks. 

--Steve
